question: When collecting data for statistical analysis, a larger sample size always guarantees more accurate results.

explanation.en: While larger sample sizes generally improve accuracy, they don't guarantee it. The quality of data collection methods, sampling bias, measurement errors, and whether the sample is representative of the population are equally important factors.
explanation.bm: Walaupun saiz sampel yang lebih besar secara umumnya meningkatkan ketepatan, ia tidak menjaminnya. Kualiti kaedah pengumpulan data, bias pensampelan, ralat pengukuran, dan sama ada sampel mewakili populasi adalah faktor yang sama penting.

hint.en: Consider what other factors besides size affect the quality of statistical data.
hint.bm: Pertimbangkan faktor lain selain saiz yang mempengaruhi kualiti data statistik.

subject: mathematics
